mods.note: K© Pyi/]S.L 19th May 1943. Dear Lord Halley, This is just to let you know that your letter to the sheikh of Sharjah has been sent to the political Agent, Bahrein, by air mail bag, with the request that it should be forwarded. Yours sincerely, iSgtJ.; F. F. TURNBUU* The Lord Hailey, GCSI., GCi..G., GGIE.6448 Wt 21725/P 139 1000 9.37 © RET Cover for Enclosures in Weekly Letter No. P. dated \ yrjrova. Secretary, Political Secret Department (External), India umce. Secretary to the Government of India, Exteonal /\ Affairs Department.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 2529/43 'Message of condolence from Sheikh of Sharjah to Lord Hailey on death of his son'

physicalDescription.extent: The file's contents are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of letters between the Shaikh of Sharjah, Francis Fearon Turnbull and E W R Lumby regarding the receipt of a condolence letter to Lord Hailey following the death of his son.
